member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.CalculationRequest.CalculationDate

Date and time when discounts and taxes are to be valid.
For most price calculations, the value is equal to the current time. When calculating prices for existing orders, the values is equal to the date and time when the order was created.

member.summary: Converts given monetary amount expressed in one currency to another currency using site specific conversion.

Code of the currency to convert amount to (e.g. EUR).
ID of the site on which the conversion is done.
member.returns: Amount converted to target currency on specific site.
member.exception: Thrown when currency with given code does not exist in the system.
Thrown when conversion fails (e.g. exchange rate not found).

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrencyConverter.Convert(System.Decimal,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts given monetary amount expressed main currency to different currency using site specific conversion.
member.param: Indicates if amount is expressed in global main currency. Amount is in site main currency when set to false.
Code of the currency to convert amount to (e.g. EUR).
ID of the site on which the conversion is done.
member.returns: Amount converted to target currency on specific site.
member.exception: Thrown when currency with given code does not exist in the system.
Thrown when conversion fails (e.g. exchange rate not found).

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrencyConverter.GetExchangeRate(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates exchange rate for conversion from one currency to another. Example: if 1 USD = 16 CZK then this method returns 1/16 = 0.0625 for conversion from USD to CZK.
member.param: Code of currency in which amount is expressed, e.g. USD, EUR.
Code of currency to convert amount to, e.g. USD, EUR.
ID of the site for which the rate is calculated.
member.returns: Exchange rate from one currency to another currency on specific site.
member.exception: Thrown when currency with given code does not exist in the system.
Thrown when conversion fails (e.g. exchange rate not found).

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrencyConverter.TryGetExchangeRate(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Decimal@)
member.summary: Calculates exchange rate for conversion from one currency to another. Example: if 1 USD = 16 CZK then this method returns 1/16 = 0.0625 for conversion from USD to CZK. All exceptions are logged into event log.
member.param: Code of currency in which amount is expressed, e.g. USD, EUR.
Code of currency to convert amount to, e.g. USD, EUR.
ID of the site for which the rate is calculated.
When this method returns, contains exchange rate from one currency to another currency on specific site.
member.returns: True if exchange rate was obtained successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrencyConverter.GetExchangeRate(System.Boolean,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates exchange rate for conversion from main currency to different currency. Example: if 1 USD = 16 CZK then this method returns 1/16 = 0.0625 for conversion from USD to CZK.
member.param: Indicates if conversion is done from global main currency or from site main currency.
Code of currency to convert amount to, e.g. USD, EUR.
ID of the site for which the rate is calculated.
member.returns: Exchange rate from main currency to another currency on specific site.
member.exception: Thrown when currency with given code does not exist in the system.
Thrown when conversion fails (e.g. exchange rate not found).

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrencyConverter.TryGetExchangeRate(System.Boolean,System.String,System.Int32,System.Decimal@)
member.summary: Calculates exchange rate for conversion from main currency to different currency. Example: if 1 USD = 16 CZK then this method returns 1/16 = 0.0625 for conversion from USD to CZK. All exceptions are logged into event log.
member.param: Indicates if conversion is done from global main currency or from site main currency.
Code of currency to convert amount to, e.g. USD, EUR.
ID of the site for which the rate is calculated.
When this method returns, contains exchange rate from main currency to different currency on specific site.
member.returns: True if exchange rate was obtained successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:CMS.Ecommerce.DefaultDeliveryBuilder
member.summary: The default implementation of . Creates delivery objects based on the calculation request.
member.remarks:
This is the default implementation of . You can derive your own implementation from this class. The following code illustrates how to register custom implementation.
[assembly:RegisterImplementation(typeof(IDeliveryBuilder), typeof(MyDeliveryBuilder))] public class MyDeliveryBuilder : DefaultDeliveryBuilder { ... }

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.DefaultDeliveryBuilder.SetFromCalculationRequest(CMS.Ecommerce.CalculationRequest,System.Func{CMS.Ecommerce.CalculationRequestItem,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Sets the currently constructed according to the supplied calculation request data.

remarks.para:
The following data is taken from the calculation request:
Shipping option The shipping option taken from .
Delivery address Taken from or when not present.
Items All items representing products are included. The allows you to further narrow the subset of items added to the constructed constructed delivery.
Please note that are not populated from the calculation request. The same applies to created from calculation request items. To include some custom data into , inherit your custom delivery builder.

member.param: The Calculation request data to be packed in the constructed delivery.
The predicate deciding which items are added to . When null, all items are added.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.DefaultDeliveryBuilder.AddItems(CMS.Ecommerce.CalculationRequest,System.Func{CMS.Ecommerce.CalculationRequestItem,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Adds calculation request items selected by the predicate to the constructed .
member.remarks: All items representing products are included. The allows you to further narrow the subset if items placed into constructed delivery.
member.param: The object from which the items are added.
The predicate deciding which items are added to . When null, all items are added.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.TaxAddressService.GetTaxAddress(CMS.Ecommerce.AddressInfo,CMS.Ecommerce.AddressInfo,CMS.Ecommerce.TaxClassInfo,CMS.Ecommerce.CustomerInfo)
member.summary: Returns an address which should be used for the tax calculation.

remarks.para: This method picks one of the supplied addresses according to the 'CMSStoreApplyTaxBasedOn' ecommerce setting (). The default address is returned when both and are null. Returns null when the settings is empty.

The and are ignored by default, but you can override this method and leverage these parameters to customize the decision logic. Use the method to get the site's default address or the method to create a completely new address (e.g. address of your store).

member.param: An address where the goods are delivered.
A tax class to get an address for.

member.name: T:CMS.Ecommerce.GtmPropertiesMerger
member.summary: Utility class for merging properties of two objects.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.GtmPropertiesMerger.Merge(CMS.Ecommerce.GtmData,System.Object,System.Boolean)

summary.para: If can be enumerated as items, then the key-value pairs are merged. Otherwise, the public properties and their values are merged.

member.param: Source object to be merged with object.
Properties of this object are merged with object.
Decides whether values of properties with the same name are substituted for values of object.
member.remarks: Objects properties are merged only on the first level.

example.para: Source object: new GtmData { a = 1, b = 2 }
Merge object: new { a = 3, c = 4 }
Rewrite equals false: new GtmData { a = 1, b = 2, c = 4 }
Rewrite equals false: new GtmData { a = 3, b = 2, c = 4 }

member.returns: New with combined properties and values of original and .
member.exception: Thrown when is null.
Thrown when can be enumerated as items, but a null key is found.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.GtmPropertiesMerger.MergeInternal(CMS.Ecommerce.GtmData,System.Object,System.Boolean)

summary.para: If can be enumerated as items, then the key-value pairs are merged. Otherwise, the public properties and their values are merged.

member.param: Source object to be merged with object.
Properties of this object are merged with object.
Decides whether values of properties with the same name are substituted for values of object.
member.remarks: Objects properties are merged only on the first level.

example.para: Source object: new GtmData { a = 1, b = 2 }
Merge object: new { a = 3, c = 4 }
Rewrite equals false: new GtmData { a = 1, b = 2, c = 4 }
Rewrite equals false: new GtmData { a = 3, b = 2, c = 4 }

member.returns: New with combined properties and values of original and .
member.exception: Thrown when is null.
Thrown when can be enumerated as items, but a null key is found.

member.summary: Tries to enumerate as items and merge them into .

The property is cached per web request and is available only within the context of a web request. The underlying services can be used directly when caching is not required.

member.summary: Indicates if user is authorized to modify SKUs.

member.summary: Checks if the are valid and product configuration can be added to the given .
member.param: where the new item will be placed.
member.remarks:
Following checks are performed:
for product/variant/option
Using of global/site products/options according current settings
Presence and validity of options for obligatory product categories
Other invalid scenarios (e.g. presence of options used in variants, adding of main product with variants, disabled options for the given main product, adding standalone options e.t.c)

Strategy used for evaluation of candidate shopping cart and its preparation for use.
Persistent storage of shopping cart objects.

member.summary: Sets current shopping cart for current visitor.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrentShoppingCartService.GetCandidateCart(System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Looks for current visitor's shopping cart candidate.
member.remarks: When the candidate cart is not found in cache, session is used to obtain shopping cart identifier. When the shopping cart identifier is not found in session, client storage is used to obtain it.
member.param: Set to true if shopping cart identifier is taken from the client.
Indicates that cart has to be evaluated afterwards.
member.returns: Candidate cart or null when no candidate cart found.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrentShoppingCartService.HandleCandidateCart(CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfo,CMS.Membership.UserInfo,CMS.DataEngine.SiteInfoIdentifier,System.Boolean,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Examines candidate shopping cart and prepares it to be used by the visitor.

remarks.para: Candidate shopping can be dropped, taken over by user or replaced with user older cart from the repository.
Candidate shopping is dropped if it is not usable on given or can not take over the cart according to .

member.param: Candidate shopping cart. When null, an existing cart from is retrieved.
User in which context is the candidate cart examined.
ID or code name of the site.
Private data are cleared when true. Private data are not cleared when the cart is replaced with user's own cart.
Indicates that cart has to be evaluated afterwards.
member.returns: Shopping cart which is suitable for shopping by on . Returns null when no such cart found.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrentShoppingCartService.GetExistingCart(CMS.Membership.UserInfo,CMS.DataEngine.SiteInfoIdentifier)
member.summary: Gets and prepares user's shopping cart from the repository.
member.param: User for which the shopping cart is returned.
ID or code name of the site to look for cart.
member.returns: User's shopping cart retrieved from the or null when not found.

member.summary: Handles candidate shopping cart which does not belong to .
member.remarks: Candidate shopping cart is dropped when it can not be taken over by .
member.param: Candidate shopping cart not belonging to .
User in which context is the candidate cart examined.
ID or code name of the site.
Private data are cleared when true.
Indicates that cart has to be evaluated afterwards.
member.returns: Shopping cart which is suitable for shopping by on . Returns null when cart can not be taken over.

member.name: T:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrentShoppingCartStrategy
member.summary: Default implementation of .
member.remarks:
You can derive your own implementation from this class to customize the way the system finds shopping cart for visitor. The following code illustrates how to register custom implementation.
[assembly:RegisterImplementation(typeof(ICurrentShoppingCartStrategy), typeof(MyCurrentShoppingCartStrategy))] public class MyCurrentShoppingCartStrategy : CurrentShoppingCartStrategy { ... }

member.exception: Thrown when any of arguments is null.

member.summary: Makes the owned by the user.
member.remarks: Updates the , and properties. If the cart is empty, it's currency is set to user's preferred currency.

User which is assigned to the .
member.exception: Thrown when any of arguments is null.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrentShoppingCartStrategy.PreferStoredCart(CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfo,CMS.Membership.UserInfo)
member.summary: Decides whether shopping cart is 'good enough' for user or an older shopping cart stored in the system should be preferred.

The user whose preference is explored.
member.returns: True if is null or empty.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrentShoppingCartStrategy.AnonymizeShoppingCart(CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfo)
member.summary: Removes personal information from the shopping cart.

remarks.para: This method is used when the current shopping was not created specifically for current user.

This situation occurs in the following situations:
User logs in. This means that cart was created for public user and now it is used for logged user.
The shopping cart was found by identifier taken from the client (). This happens when the cache () expires and it is not guaranteed that cart belongs to different anonymous customer.

member.param: Shopping cart which private data are cleared.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.CurrentShoppingCartStrategy.RefreshCart(CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfo)
member.summary: Ensures that does not contain invalid data.
member.remarks: Invalidates cached discounts and checks selected currency.

member.param: The shopping cart to clear private data.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.ICurrentShoppingCartStrategy.AnonymizeShoppingCart(CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfo)
member.summary: Removes personal information from the shopping cart.

remarks.para: This method is used when the current shopping was not created specifically for current user.

This situation occurs in the following situations:
User logs in. This means that cart was created for public user and now it is used for logged user. The shopping cart was found by identifier taken from the client (). This happens when the cache () expires and it is not guaranteed that cart belongs to different anonymous customer.

member.param: Shopping cart which private data are cleared.

member.summary: Ensures that does not contain invalid data.
member.remarks: This method is used to remove possibly outdated values from shopping cart. This can happen when the cart is fetched from the database or cache after longer period of time.

member.summary: Shopping cart item ID.

member.summary: Shopping cart item unique identifier. Shopping cart item means collection of the product and its selected product options.

member.summary: Unique identifier of the parent shopping cart item. When set current SKU is a product option, otherwise it is a product.

member.summary: Unique identifier of parent shopping cart item. If set, this shopping cart item is a bundle item.

member.summary: Shopping cart item custom data.

member.summary: Shopping cart ID.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.SKUID
member.summary: SKU ID.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.CartItemUnits
member.summary: Amount of the current shopping cart item in the shopping cart.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.CartItemValidTo
member.summary: It is set only when cart item represents e-product and when the cart item was loaded from the existing e-product order item. Then it is date and time until the e-product download links are valid.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.CartItemAutoAddedUnits
member.summary: The number of shopping cart item units added automatically to the shopping cart for free.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.CartItemText
member.summary: It is set only when cart item represents text product option. Then it is the text defined by the customer, e.g. custom label for a T-shirt.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.OrderItem
member.summary: Order item data. Loaded when the shopping cart is created from an existing order, otherwise it is null.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.UnitDiscountSummary
member.summary: Gets or sets the summary of the discounts applied on each unit of this item.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.UnitPrice
member.summary: Unit price of the shopping cart item in shopping cart currency. Catalog-level discounts are reflected.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.UnitTotalPriceIncludingOptions
member.summary: Gets the total price of one unit including options.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.UnitTotalDiscount
member.summary: Unit discount applied on the shopping cart item.
member.remarks: The value is expressed in the shopping cart currency and includes catalog-level discounts (product coupons, volume and catalog discounts). For summary of catalog-level discounts see .

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.TotalPriceIncludingOptions
member.summary: Gets the total price including options.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.TotalPrice
member.summary: Total price of the shopping cart item in shopping cart currency.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.TotalDiscount
member.summary: Total discount applied on the shopping cart item.
member.remarks: The value is expressed in the shopping cart currency and does not include catalog-level discounts (product coupons, volume and catalog discounts).

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.DiscountSummary
member.summary: Gets or sets the summary of the discounts applied on this item.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.UnitWeight
member.summary: Unit weight of the shopping cart item.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.TotalWeight
member.summary: Total weight of the shopping cart item.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.ShoppingCart
member.summary: Data of the shopping cart to which the shopping cart item belongs.

member.summary: Data of the SKU (product) which is represented by the shopping cart item.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.ProductOptions
member.summary: List with product options of the shopping cart item.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether is accessory product.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether is attribute option (e.g. product color).

member.summary: Indicates if shopping cart item is representing product or product option.

member.summary: List of bundle items of the shopping cart item.

member.summary: Indicates if shopping cart item is representing bundle item.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.ParentProduct
member.summary: Shopping cart item which represents product in which the current product option is included. If the current item is not product option, returns null.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.VariantParent
member.summary: In case the shopping cart item is a variant, returns its parent product. If the current item is not variant, returns null;

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.ParentBundle
member.summary: Shopping cart item which represents bundle product in which the current bundle item is included. If the current item is not bundle item, returns null.

member.summary: Adds an item to the current shopping cart and logs the activity. Saves the shopping cart if it has not been saved yet. If an item in such configuration is already present in the cart, its quantity is increased by . Saves all product options and bundle items after adding and evaluates the cart.
member.param: Id of SKU item to be added.
Quantity of the item to be added.
member.returns: Returns the resulting item added/updated.
member.exception: Thrown when specifies a product from a different site than current shopping cart belongs to.

remarks.para: The method does nothing when is less than 1 and returns null.
This override is effectively the same as encapsulating given arguments in a new object and calling .

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingService.SaveCart
member.summary: Validates and saves the shopping cart into the database.
member.exception: Thrown when validation of shopping cart, its items, customer addresses, payment or shipping option fails.
member.remarks: It is not necessary to call this method after modifying a shopping cart through the other methods of the (adding or removing items, setting the customer, addresses, shipping and payment options, etc.). These methods save the shopping cart automatically. The method is useful when you need to save a shopping cart to the database after it gets modified outside of the . For example, call the method after validating the cart prior to checkout (e.g. this could remove cart items which are sold out).

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemValidator.Validate
member.summary: Validates individual shopping cart item. The following conditions must hold true for each item in cart for validation to pass: 1) All shopping cart items are enabled 2) Max units in one order are not exceeded 3) There is enough units in the inventory 4) Customer is registered, if there is a membership type product in the cart 5) Product validity is valid, if there is a membership or e-product type product in the cart.
member.returns: Returns true if validation passed, otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemValidator.ValidateSKUIsEnabled(CMS.Ecommerce.SKUInfo)
member.summary: Validates that SKU is enabled and not expired.
member.returns: Result of validation

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemValidator.ValidateCustomerMembership(CMS.Ecommerce.SKUInfo)
member.summary: Validates that customer is either a member or membership is not required.
member.returns: Returns false if membership is required and customer is not a member, otherwise return true.

member.summary: Validates that cart contains at least required amount of units.
